title: Teacher Training on Language Curriculum Design Using AR-Based Collaborative Constructivism

context.prior_knowledge: Basic theories of curriculum design and experience in utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: Providing a collaborative learning environment to enhance curriculum design competencies using AR technology for current language teachers

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively explain 20 core concepts of language curriculum design using an AR app through problem-based learning.
Assessing the ability to design AR learning scenarios based on constructivist pedagogy.
Complete a curriculum development project that incorporates the applicability of digital technologies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
